name: Hubot for IRC
description: One-button deploy for Hubot on Heroku with IRC adapter.

HEROKU_URL.description: Url of this app so hubot can regularly ping himself to stay awake.

HUBOT_SLACK_TOKEN.description: The token you are given by Slack when you add the Hubot integration.

HUBOT_SLACK_TEAM.description: Your team's Slack subdomain. e.g. if your team is https://myteam.slack.com/, you would enter 'myteam' here.
